General.Name: AB Linas
General.Description: AB Linas produces and sells linen textile products in Lithuania. It offers weaving preparation services, weaving services, yarn dyeing services, fabric finishing services, and sewing services. The company also exports its products to Great Britain, Latvia, Sweden, Japan, Spain, Finland, Germany, Belgium, the United States, Denmark, and internationally. AB Linas was founded in 1957 and is based in Panevezys, Lithuania.
